title: Towards spike-based machine intelligence with neuromorphic computing

tldr.text: An overview of the developments in neuromorphic computing for both algorithms and hardware is provided and the fundamentals of learning and hardware frameworks are highlighted, with emphasis on algorithm–hardware codesign.
